no.patternsolutions.javann
Class Hopfield

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      no.patternsolutions.javann.NeuralNet
          no.patternsolutions.javann.Hopfield
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Hopfield
extends NeuralNet

A neural net with one layer of fully connected nodes. Hopfield network was introduced in 1982 by J. Hopfield.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getIterations

public int getIterations()
Gets the number of iterations before it is checked if there has been any changes. the total number of iterations will always be n*iterations. The last iterations will then have no changes of the nodes.

Overrides:
getIterations in class NeuralNet

the number of iterations.

run

public boolean[] run(boolean[] input)
Test the network with a set of input nodes.

Parameters:
input - a table of input nodes.
Returns:
a table of output nodes.

setIterations

public void setIterations(int iterations)
Sets the number of iterations before it is checked if there has been any changes. the total number of iterations will always be n*iterations. The last iterations will then have no changes of the nodes. The default value is ten times the number of nodes.

Overrides:
setIterations in class NeuralNet
Parameters:
iterations - the number of iterations.

setRandomUpdate

public void setRandomUpdate(boolean enabled)
Enables updating of the network randomly. If it's not randomly, it will be updated in sequential order.

Parameters:
enabled - true if random update shall be enabled, false if not.

trainPatterns

public void trainPatterns(boolean[][] input)
Trains a set of patterns.

Parameters:
input - a table of the input patterns.
